pages.text: The $(marked)Tattered Prince$() is an entity from the Halls of Carcosa.$(br)He possesses great power and is commonly found as an idol of worship. Dedicated Serfs usually summon him through the $(l:miskatoncmysteries:rites/golden_coronation)$(marked)Golden Coronation$(), as a conduit for further ascension.
Much like Yellow Serfs, he is very protective, and will cast extremely powerful spells for defense.
